channel.title: When Filtering Topics
channel.description:
Please make sure that you are messaging members of the topics that are being denied. Someone just messaged me asking if their tutorial was in here. He said that he had posted it yesterday and asked another mod if it was in here, but it wasn't, so he posted it again. If you are not going to message people who do not quite meet our expectations, then do not use this system.
Note: The above is only for topics that are intended to be tutorials. Any spam or question topics can be removed without messaging the poster or adding their name to the Abusive Member List.
